job.title: Site Reliability Engineer
job.description: ltpgtWe are seeking ltstronggtSite Reliability Engineers also accepting Software EngineersDevelopersltstronggt for a ltstronggtfull time roleltstronggt If you are looking to be part of a team that is excited about building a suite of services that are enterprise scale for one of the top ranked companies then keep reading Were looking for top candidates that can contribute to a top tier teamltpgtltpgtltbrgtltpgtltpgtltstronggtFULLY REMOTEltstronggtltpgtltpgtltbrgtltpgtltpgtltstronggtRequirementsltstronggtltpgtltulgtltligtltstronggtBachelors Degree in Computer Scienceltstronggt other enumerate degreeltligtltligt6 years ofltstronggt JavaPythonltstronggt experience in a professional environmentltligtltligtStrong professional experience in the design and development of pipelines from large databasesltligtltligt3 years experience in extract cluster or classifying high quality features from unstructured dataltligtltligtAbility to design and implement efficient ltstronggtalgorithmsltstronggt ltligtltligtAbility to debug ltstronggtoptimize codeltstronggt an automate routine tasks ltligtltulgtltpgtltbrgtltpgtltpgtltstronggtltugtNo 3rd party candidates No H1B or OPT EADltugtltstronggtltpgtltpgtltbrgtltpgtltpgtltstronggtPayCompensation Packageltstronggtltpgtltulgtltligt135K175K base salary depending on experienceltligtltligt36K60K sign on bonus depending on experienceltligtltligtFull benefitsltligtltligtStock optionsltligtltulgtltpgtltbrgtltpgtltpgtltstronggtltugtIF you are interested and available please forward your resume to ryanhughescomcentriccom or text 970 7737230 for immediate considerationltugtltstronggtltpgt
